Question.Subject: question about blogtv?
Question.Content: why dont people talk? i have 10 "viewers" and 0 "chatters" who arent the viewers "chatters" ??
Question.ChosenAnswer: Well, people can be watching your broadcast without being signed into the chat. I have noticed the view count often lags behind the number of actual chatters. This could be a glitch or a way for blogtv to keep broadcasters happy.

Answer.Content: Well, people can be watching your broadcast without being signed into the chat. I have noticed the view count often lags behind the number of actual chatters. This could be a glitch or a way for blogtv to keep broadcasters happy.
